format:
Hello,

I am excited to apply for the [position] at [company]. With a B.S. in Computer Science from the University of Missouri - Kansas City and over three years of software development experience at Venture Capitalists, I am confident in my ability to contribute effectively to your team.

In my previous role, I developed data analysis software, Monte Carlo simulations, and BI dashboards that enhanced decision-making processes. My technical skills include Python, SQL, C++, JavaScript, Docker, and Kubernetes. Additionally, I have led projects like Project ASBC, an AI-driven surveillance application with 90% accuracy in real-time object detection.

Thank you for considering my application. Please feel free to contact me at 816-547-9589 or lxrbckl@protonmail.com.

Sincerely,
